STATIC_text.text: Following is an alphabetized list of the drugs referred to in Chapter 21 (tables), with brand name(s) in parentheses and explanation of their use, including drug category and/or class. This Appendix, along with drugs listed alphabetically by brand name, also appears on the Evolve website.

STATIC_table.text:
